001    package com.winupon.andframe.bigapple.cache.core;
002    
003    import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
004    import java.util.Map;
005    
006    /**
007     * LRUå†…å­˜ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œæ‹·è´Androidæºç ï¼ˆbitmapæ¨¡å—ä¸­çš„ç¼“å­˜æ›´å¥½ç”¨ï¼Œæ‰©å±•äº†ç¼“å­˜è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´è®¾ç½®ï¼‰
008     * 
009     * @author xuan
010     * @version $Revision: 1.0 $, $Date: 2013-8-1 ä¸‹åˆ4:51:58 $
011     */
012    public class LruCache<K, V> {
013        private final LinkedHashMap<K, V> map;
014    
015        private int size;// å®é™…å®¹é‡
016        private final int maxSize;// æœ?¤§å®¹é‡ï¼Œäº‹å…ˆå†³å®šçš„
017    
018        private int putCount;// å­˜å…¥æ¬¡æ•°
019        private int createCount;// è¢«åˆ›å»ºæ¬¡æ•?    private int evictionCount;// è¢«å‰”é™¤æ¬¡æ•?    private int hitCount;// å‘½ä¸­æ¬¡æ•°
020        private int missCount;// æ²¡å‘½ä¸­æ¬¡æ•?
021        public LruCache(int maxSize) {
022            if (maxSize <= 0) {
023                throw new IllegalArgumentException("maxSize <= 0");
024            }
025            this.maxSize = maxSize;
026            this.map = new LinkedHashMap<K, V>(0, 0.75f, true);// trueè¡¨ç¤ºä»¥è®¿é—®é¡ºåºæ’åº?    }
027    
028        /**
029         * è·å–ç¼“å­˜
030         * 
031         * @param key
032         * @return
033         */
034        public final V get(K key) {
035            if (key == null) {
036                throw new NullPointerException("key == null");
037            }
038    
039            V mapValue;
040            synchronized (this) {
041                mapValue = map.get(key);
042                if (mapValue != null) {
043                    hitCount++;
044                    return mapValue;
045                }
046                missCount++;
047            }
048    
049            V createdValue = create(key);
050            if (createdValue == null) {
051                return null;
052            }
053    
054            synchronized (this) {
055                createCount++;
056                mapValue = map.put(key, createdValue);
057    
058                if (mapValue != null) {
059                    // æœ‰å†²çªï¼Œæ”¾å›æœ?¿‘putè¿›å»çš„é‚£ä¸ªå?
060                    map.put(key, mapValue);
061                }
062                else {
063                    size += safeSizeOf(key, createdValue);
064                }
065            }
066    
067            if (mapValue != null) {
068                entryRemoved(false, key, createdValue, mapValue);
069                return mapValue;
070            }
071            else {
072                trimToSize(maxSize);
073                return createdValue;
074            }
075        }
076    
077        /**
078         * æ”¾å…¥ç¼“å­˜
079         * 
080         * @param key
081         * @param value
082         * @return
083         */
084        public final V put(K key, V value) {
085            if (key == null || value == null) {
086                throw new NullPointerException("key == null || value == null");
087            }
088    
089            V previous;
090            synchronized (this) {
091                putCount++;
092                size += safeSizeOf(key, value);
093                previous = map.put(key, value);
094                if (previous != null) {
095                    size -= safeSizeOf(key, previous);
096                }
097            }
098    
099            if (previous != null) {
100                entryRemoved(false, key, previous, value);
101            }
102    
103            trimToSize(maxSize);
104            return previous;
105        }
106    
107        /**
108         * å‡å°‘ç¼“å­˜åˆ°maxSize
109         * 
110         * @param maxSize
111         */
112        private void trimToSize(int maxSize) {
113            while (true) {
114                K key;
115                V value;
116                synchronized (this) {
117                    if (size < 0 || (map.isEmpty() && size != 0)) {
118                        throw new IllegalStateException(getClass().getName()
119                                + ".sizeOf() is reporting inconsistent results!");
120                    }
121    
122                    if (size <= maxSize || map.isEmpty()) {
123                        break;
124                    }
125    
126                    Map.Entry<K, V> toEvict = map.entrySet().iterator().next();
127                    key = toEvict.getKey();
128                    value = toEvict.getValue();
129                    map.remove(key);
130                    size -= safeSizeOf(key, value);
131                    evictionCount++;
132                }
133    
134                entryRemoved(true, key, value, null);
135            }
136        }
137    
138        /**
139         * åˆ é™¤ç¼“å­˜
140         * 
141         * @param key
142         * @return
143         */
144        public final V remove(K key) {
145            if (key == null) {
146                throw new NullPointerException("key == null");
147            }
148    
149            V previous;
150            synchronized (this) {
151                previous = map.remove(key);
152                if (previous != null) {
153                    size -= safeSizeOf(key, previous);
154                }
155            }
156    
157            if (previous != null) {
158                entryRemoved(false, key, previous, null);
159            }
160    
161            return previous;
162        }
163    
164        /**
165         * å­ç±»å¯è‡ªè¡Œå®ç°ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡ç§»é™¤ç¼“å­˜æ—¶éƒ½ä¼šè¢«è°ƒç”¨
166         * 
167         * @param evicted
168         * @param key
169         * @param oldValue
170         * @param newValue
171         */
172        protected void entryRemoved(boolean evicted, K key, V oldValue, V newValue) {
173        }
174    
175        /**
176         * å­ç±»å¯è‡ªè¡Œå®ç°ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æ²¡æœ‰åå­—ï¼Œä¼šè¢«è°ƒç”?     * 
177         * @param key
178         * @return
179         */
180        protected V create(K key) {
181            return null;
182        }
183    
184        /**
185         * å­ç±»å¯è‡ªè¡Œå®ç°ï¼Œç”¨æ¥è®¡ç®—ç¼“å­˜çš„å¤§å°ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªç®—ä¸€ä¸?     * 
186         * @param key
187         * @param value
188         * @return
189         */
190        protected int sizeOf(K key, V value) {
191            return 1;
192        }
193    
194        // åˆ¤æ–­æ¯ä¸ªç¼“å­˜çš„å¤§å°æ˜¯å¦å®‰å…?    private int safeSizeOf(K key, V value) {
195            int result = sizeOf(key, value);
196            if (result < 0) {
197                throw new IllegalStateException("Negative size: " + key + "=" + value);
198            }
199            return result;
200        }
201    
202        /**
203         * å‰”é™¤æ‰?œ‰ç¼“å­˜
204         */
205        public final void evictAll() {
206            trimToSize(-1);// ç´§ç¼©åˆ?1ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯å…¨éƒ¨åˆ é™¤å–½
207        }
208    
209        public synchronized final int size() {
210            return size;
211        }
212    
213        public synchronized final int maxSize() {
214            return maxSize;
215        }
216    
217        public synchronized final int hitCount() {
218            return hitCount;
219        }
220    
221        public synchronized final int missCount() {
222            return missCount;
223        }
224    
225        public synchronized final int createCount() {
226            return createCount;
227        }
228    
229        public synchronized final int putCount() {
230            return putCount;
231        }
232    
233        public synchronized final int evictionCount() {
234            return evictionCount;
235        }
236    
237        public synchronized final Map<K, V> snapshot() {
238            return new LinkedHashMap<K, V>(map);
239        }
240    
241        public synchronized final String toString() {
242            int accesses = hitCount + missCount;
243            int hitPercent = accesses != 0 ? (100 * hitCount / accesses) : 0;
244            return String.format("LruMemoryCache[maxSize=%d,hits=%d,misses=%d,hitRate=%d%%]", maxSize, hitCount, missCount,
245                    hitPercent);
246        }
247    
248    }
